description: Monthly-varying sea ice concentrations from years 111 to 140 of the pre-industrial control (piControl) experiment with a uniform SST increase of 4K.
name: PIControlSICMonthlyVarPlusUniform4K
rationale: To provide sea ice concentration (SIC) boundary conditions for the CFMIP sstPi4K experiment.
longName: Monthly-varying sea ice concentrations from the pre-industrial control simulation with uniform SST increase of 4K
keywords: sea ice concentration, piControl, pre-industrial control, SIC, monthly-varying, plus uniform SST 4K, SST+4K
